about.title: Narxoz Business School
about.description: Narxoz Business School prepares a new generation of leaders capable of shaping a sustainable future in Central Asia and beyond. Our MBA, Executive MBA, DBA and corporate training programs combine cutting-edge research with practice, helping managers and entrepreneurs develop vision, skills and courage to implement innovations and leadership in a rapidly changing world. Together we raise the standards of business education in the region.

ranking.title: Narxoz University Business School MBA program recognized as #1 in Central Asia
ranking.description1: The published QS Global MBA ranking highlights the program's strengths. On September 25, 2024, the QS Global MBA 2025 ranking was published. The Narxoz University Business School MBA program entered the top 50 best in Asia for the first time (QS Global MBA 2025 Asia: #42) and based on open data and QS methodology for calculating overall scores became #1 in the Central Asian region.
ranking.description2: Based on data published by QS agency, the MBA program also ranks in the top 50 best in the world by entrepreneurship and graduate employability criteria. By this indicator, Narxoz University Business School scored high points and outperformed other world-renowned schools such as Carnegie Mellon and Dartmouth (USA), Shanghai University of Finance and Economics and Tsinghua (China), Edinburgh and Manchester (UK).

news.title: Narxoz Business School entered the top 50 best business schools in Asia according to QS
news.description: The MBA program of Narxoz University Business School took 42nd place in the QS Global MBA 2025 Asia ranking and became #1 in the Central Asian region.

news.title: A new Executive MBA program focused on digital transformation has been launched
news.description: Narxoz Business School presented an updated Executive MBA program, which includes modules on artificial intelligence and digital technologies.

news.title: MBA students participated in an international hackathon in Singapore
news.description: The Narxoz Business School team took second place at an international hackathon on sustainable development, organized by partner universities.

news.title: A new corporate center for Executive Education programs has been opened
news.description: A modern corporate center with innovative auditoriums and spaces for teamwork has opened on the Narxoz campus.

faculty.name: Yelzhas Aubakirov
faculty.description: MBA, MSF, CFA, CMA – expert with 20 years of experience in finance, direct investments, venture capital, and consulting. Specializes in deals, due diligence, company valuation, and strategic investment. Consults startups and large businesses in various industries.

faculty.name: Oleg Alfyorov
faculty.description: Business development consultant. Project management experience - over 25 years, including work in international projects: Poland, Slovakia, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark. Internships in the Netherlands and Sweden. Studied at business schools: NTU (Singapore), HKUST (Hong Kong), SDA Bocconi (Milan, Italy), Darden School of Business (USA). Business coach.

faculty.name: Yulia Dmitrieva
faculty.description: Head of JD Expert agency. Business development consultant, analytics and strategy. 20 years in marketing and sales, 120+ industry studies, of which 40+ have been implemented in existing businesses, 10 closed or reoriented business ideas, over 30 years of total partner support.

faculty.name: Irina Vigovskaya
faculty.description: Internationally accredited business coach in mediation, TRIZ-facilitation, and corporate governance. Partner of UN Women in Kazakhstan and Central Asia, with over 20 years of experience in teaching and mediation practice. Worked in managerial positions, including leadership roles.

faculty.name: Liliya Bisengali
faculty.description: PhD in law, compliance manager, Senior Legal Consultant (KPMG), expert in corporate law and risk management. Over 15 years of experience in legal consulting and corporate governance. Specializes in corporate law, compliance, and risk management.

faculty.name: Zevira Toleutaeva
faculty.description: K.эн, ACCA, member of the Advisory Body of the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Kazakhstan, expert in international financial reporting standards. Over 20 years of experience in auditing and consulting. Specializes in IFRS, auditing, and financial consulting.

faculty.name: Kaisar Makan
faculty.description: MBA, Certified Business Trainer, Facilitator, Professional International Coach Erickson International Coach ICF. Over 15 years of experience in corporate training and leadership development. Specializes in developing leadership competencies and teamwork.

faculty.name: Marina Novotochina
faculty.description: Executive coach, business trainer, HR consultant, Doctor of Business Administration (DBA). Over 25 years of experience in HR management and organizational development. Specializes in leadership development, change management, and organizational development.

administration.name: Ewan Simpson
administration.position: Doctor, PhD, Director for International Development Narxoz Business School

administration.name: Agipa Monobayeva
administration.position: Academic Director Narxoz Business School, Head of DBA, Doctor of Philosophy (PhD)

administration.name: Anna Anisimova
administration.position: Operational Director Narxoz Business School for MBA, EMBA programs

administration.name: Gulnar Zhumanova
administration.position: Director of the Center for Additional and Professional Education (CDPO) Narxoz Business School

administration.name: Saltanat Abdeldinova
administration.position: Head of the Center for Applied Finance (CPF) Narxoz Business School

support.title: Support the business school
support.description: Narxoz Business School - these are programs for the development of professionals and leaders and the strongest business community. Our corporate connections, partnership - this is truly an environment for development, the emergence of new knowledge and your future successes. You can become a partner of any program, allocate your own grants or scholarship support to our students. Join us, together we will change ourselves, business and the world for the better!

programs.title: Programs
programs.mbaDescription: Comprehensive MBA program for developing the next generation of leaders. Strategic management, finance, marketing. 2 years of study.
programs.mbaFinanceDescription: Specialized MBA program with in-depth study of finance, financial analysis, and corporate finance.
programs.mbaSustainabilityDescription: MBA program focused on sustainable business development, environmentally responsible entrepreneurship, and social impact.
programs.mbaAIDescription: Innovative MBA program dedicated to applying artificial intelligence in modern business and digital transformation.
programs.mbaCreativeDescription: MBA program for developing management skills in creative industries, media, arts, and innovative economy.
programs.mbaFinTechDescription: Specialized MBA program for studying financial technologies, blockchain, digital payments, and innovative financial services.
programs.executiveMbaDescription: Program for top managers. Strategic management and business modeling. Modular format for working executives.
programs.executiveMbaNGODescription: Specialized Executive MBA program for leaders of non-profit organizations and social enterprises.
programs.executiveMbaCIODescription: Executive MBA program for Chief Information Officers and IT department leaders.
programs.dbaDescription: The highest level of business education for top executives and business owners. Program for practicing professionals.
programs.mscFinanceDescription: Master of Science in Finance. Program for specialists who want to deepen their knowledge in the financial sphere.

hero.title: Narxoz Business School
hero.subtitle: Leading today, changing the world tomorrow

about.mainTitle: Narxoz Business School: where leaders create the future

mission.title: Mission and Vision
mission.description: Narxoz Business School forms a new generation of leaders ready to transform business, society and economy in Central Asia and beyond. We combine cutting-edge research with practice and global business education standards so that managers, entrepreneurs and ambitious professionals develop strategic vision, skills and courage to implement innovations in a rapidly changing world.

programs.title: Programs and Partnerships
programs.description: We offer MBA, Executive MBA, DBA, Mini MBA programs, open trainings and exclusive solutions for companies. Our partners are leading world universities including ESMT Berlin, Penn State, University of Monaco, and visiting professors from Harvard, Columbia, Yale and world bestseller authors regularly conduct classes for our students.

achievements.title: Achievements and Recognition
achievements.description: We are proud that our MBA programs are recognized as #1 in Central Asia in the world ranking. This confirms that we create education that meets and exceeds world standards.

about.quote: At Narxoz Business School, we create a space where knowledge meets practice and learning becomes an investment in tomorrow's career and leadership.

international.title: International Recognition
international.description: Our programs are accredited by leading organizations (FIBAA, IQAA) and meet world quality standards.
